title: [LFT] Platinum Mid/Jg Main looking for active serious team
body:
IGN: damosstorm
Current Rank: Plat 5 (but paired with plat 3's and 2's) 
Very active, play almost every day and flexible times as long as not in school. 
I play Mid/Jg the best but can play adc/top relatively well.
Willing to improve, never rage . 
Want to join team for experience and to improve in LoL
I have Skype, Teamspeak3 and can download any alternatives ( working mic of course) 
I'm 15 turning 16 in July
Message me for any other info i guess, if i forgot it. 

~Damian
